settings.text:
Caravan Food Group Incorporated (CFGI) is a Food and Beverage company composed of creative and dynamic individuals headed and founded by young entrepreneur and Chief Executive Officer, Francis G. Reyes.

In 2017, the goal of innovating and introducing new food concepts began as we believe that food is only as good as one's overall experience. This has led Mr. Reyes to see potential in rolled ice creams and various doughnuts for the Philippines market that quickly launched in the same year guided by its core values, mission, and vision.

INCLUSIVITY AND DIVERSITY.

CFGI is a place for all, we look beyond limitations and see through everyone's potential. From the hiring Deaf to people with mental disabilities, we hope to inspire people to follow our cause.

SUSTAINABILITY AND LOCALIZATIONS.

We are a company that believes in the quality of Filipino products. Our ingredients come from home-grown farms with the intent of supporting our local industry.

PASSION

We want dynamid and passionate individuals who believe in our brands and our advocies. We inspire everyone to go above and beyond to deliver only the best products and services.

CREATIVITY AND INNOVATION

In this fast changing world, we keep on finding new ways to help improve our service, products and food concepts. We encourage our team to use out-of-the-box solutions to problems in our day-to-day operations, promotions and marketing strategies.

DRIVER OF HAPPINESS

Our concepts are designed to put a smile to everyoneâ€™s face.

We deliver happiness through our services, products and throughour cheerful and friendly team members and partners.
